settings.title: Settings
settings.wipeConfirmMessage: This action will erase all Pubky Ring data and cannot be undone.

network.backOnlineDescription: You can now authorize with Pubky Ring
network.offlineDescription: You need to be online to authorize with Pubky Ring

auth.trustWarning: Make sure you trust this relay, service, browser, or device before authorizing with your pubky.
auth.navigateBackToBrowser: Please navigate back to your browser.
auth.timeoutError: The authentication process took too long. Please try again.

import.title: Import Pubky
import.invalidClipboardData: Clipboard does not contain a valid recovery phrase or secret key
import.notValidSecretKey: Not a valid secret key or recovery phrase.

pubky.selectToProcess: Please select a pubky to proceed
pubky.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this pubky?
pubky.selectPubkyMessage: Select which pubky you want to use to authorize this service, browser or device.
pubky.noPubkysAvailable: You do not have any pubky's that are setup and available. Please create and setup a pubky first.
pubky.yourPubkyDescription: This is your first unique identifier, your pubky. Create as many as you need for different purposes. You are your keys.
pubky.setupExistingToProcess: Please setup any of your existing Pubkys to proceed.
pubky.addAndSetupToProcess: Please add and setup a Pubky to proceed.

backup.backupMessage: Enter a password or passphrase to encrypt and secure your backup. Keep it safe, you'll need it to restore your pubky.
backup.importMessage: Enter your password or passphrase to decrypt your pubky backup.
backup.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least {{min}} {{chars}} long
backup.recoveryPhraseMessage: Write down these 12 words in the right order and store them in a safe place.
backup.recoveryWarning: Never share your recovery phrase with anyone as this may result in the loss of access to your profile, data, and online identity.
backup.couldNotRetrieveSecretKey: Could not retrieve secret key for backup

welcome.homeserverMessageStart: Your invite code is valid. Your pubky
welcome.homeserverMessageEnd: is now configured to use the Synonym homeserver for data hosting.

session.sessionReturned: Session data sent to requesting app
session.cannotOpenCallback: Cannot open callback URL to return session

errors.failedToParseQR: Failed to parse QR code data
errors.failedToProcessQR: Failed to process QR code data
errors.noClipboardPubky: No pubky provided for clipboard handling
errors.unrecognizedFormat: Unrecognized format. Expected a recovery phrase, invite code, auth URL, or session request.
errors.signupFailedDescription: Please check your signup link is still valid, then try again.
errors.failedToCreatePubkyWithInvite: Failed to create pubky with invite code

terms.acceptTerms: I declare that I have read and accept the terms of use.

about.craftedBy: Pubky Ring was crafted by Synonym Software Ltd. You are your keys.

addPubky.createOrImportQuestion: Do you want to create a new pubky or import an existing one?
addPubky.chooseBackupMethod: Choose the backup method you used.
addPubky.enterRecoveryWords:
Enter the 12 words from your recovery 
phrase to import or restore your pubky.

editPubkySheet.unableToSignUp: Unable to sign up with the homeserver. Please update the homeserver and/or invite code and try again.
editPubkySheet.unableToSignIn: Unable to sign in to homeserver: {{error}}

scanInvite.invalidInviteDescription: Please scan a valid invite code or signup QR

selectBackup.title: Backup Pubky
selectBackup.message: Choose your preferred backup method for pubky {{pubky}} to restore access if you lose your phone or your data.

clipboard.pubkyCopiedDescription: Your Pubky has been copied to the clipboard

pubkyErrors.deleteError: An error occurred while deleting the Pubky.

inviteCode.title: Invite code.
inviteCode.description: Enter your code to access the Synonym homeserver. You get 1GB of storage, used for your posts, photos, videos, and profile.

homeserver.chooseMessage: Choose a homeserver to host your data for pubky
homeserver.label: HOMESERVER

requestInvite.askTeam: Ask the Pubky team for your invite code to access the Synonym homeserver.
